text: @SecAzar @WhiteHouse @POTUS Dear Leader is proud to announce his commitment to the final frontier of #coronavirus vaccines, therapeutics, and diagnostics to sell to the American people in record time with less burdensome regulations and time consuming testing to help hasten the production of these products
